phrase: What you suspected is true, try to be kind to them, for this kindness will help make everything better.
author: proverbia.net

phrase: A beautiful dream will come true for you and you will see how other dreams become reality.
author: Japanese Proverb

phrase: The reality of a human being is their thought, not their material body.
author: proverbia.net

phrase: You will marry a professional athlete. If eating competitions can be considered a sport.
author: proverbia.net

phrase: Brave is the one who loves.
author: proverbia.net

phrase: You don't have to be faster than the bear, you just have to be faster than the slowest guy running from it.
author: proverbia.net

phrase: Don't take life too seriously. You won't get out of it alive.
author: proverbia.net

phrase: Tomorrow may be too late to enjoy what you have today.
author: ajescudero

phrase: When you seek what you desire most, remember to do your best.
author: ajescudero

phrase: Don't forget that a friend is a gift you give to yourself.
author: ajescudero

phrase: Rejoice, a path of beautiful passions awaits you and you must walk it.
author: ajescudero

phrase: A reputation of a thousand years can depend on the conduct of one hour.
author: Japanese Proverb

phrase: Feel the happiness that waits for you and don't forget to catch it to keep it with you.
author: ajescudero

phrase: Rejoice, a path of beautiful passions awaits you and you must walk it.
author: ajescudero

phrase: Not everyone can receive the same things. Be practical.
author: ajescudero
